name: amazon-fba-dashboard
description: Amazon FBA売上データ分析ダッシュボード

scripts.security-check: echo Checking for sensitive files... && (Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Include *.csv,*demo*.html,test-*.html -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 5 | ForEach-Object { Write-Host $_.FullName }) || echo No sensitive files found
scripts.pre-commit: npm run security-check && npm run build
